named-query.name: aggegrateSetGroup.byKey
named-query.query: select asg from AggregateSetGroup asg left join fetch asg.aggregateSetGroupEntries where keyValue = :keyValue

named-query.name: aggegrateSet.byKey

named-query.name: analysisDataSource.byKey
